reviews.text: Lovely little station, clean and tidy...great views too!
A modernized train platform in a useful location.

The Newcourt Railway Station is situated between Liberty Way and Jack Sadler Way alongside the central community area.  (Please note that the current map position shown here is incorrect, too far North along Liberty Way.)
The address as displayed on the new platform is Newcourt Station Road (Devon Metro), Exeter  EX2 7FR.
As of 31st May 2015, the expected opening date is Thursday 4th June 2015; however, planned industrial action for 4th and 5th June may delay this.
This station is an ideal 'get off' point for the new Newcourt Community Centre, Blakeslee Drive, with its excellent accommodation and facilities.
Please see station development progress on FriendsOfNewcourtStation - FONS website / Facebook pages.
